entry.title: Proposal for an invoice pattern with an embedded Bitcoin onchain address
entry.summary: It is now possible to embed a bitcoin address into an LN invoice. John Carvalho has provided an example of this on https://thebiz.pro, which can be accessed by clicking “contribute”. The embedded bitcoin address can be seen in the example and uses the format: bitcoin:bc1qfzaj2jaqhq7yn9hy3c00ndat4lq9me7sdvgc4q?. John Carvalho can be contacted through his schedule at https://calendly.com/bitcoinerrorlog, his chat at https://t.me/bitcoinerrorlog, or his Twitter at https://twitter.com/bitcoinerrorlog.
